data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Torino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Torino in their own half.
Andrea Belotti is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Andrea Belotti is back on the pitch.
In the minute 3, Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
Throw-in Crotone.
Crotone to take a throw-in in Torino territory.
In the minute 5, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Crotone's Milos Vulic has been booked in Turin.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Torino.
In the minute 8, Crotone have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
Crotone's Milos Vulic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Torino defender.
Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, Francesco Fourneau awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
In Turin Crotone's Pedro Pereira is caught offside.
Throw-in for Torino close to the penalty box.
In the minute 13, Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Crotone.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 17, Free kick Crotone.
The match at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino has been interrupted briefly for a check on Mergim Vojvoda, who is down injured.
Crotone's Simeon Nwankwo has run offside.
In the minute 19, Torino's Mergim Vojvoda is back in action after a slight knock.
Torino have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Crotone at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 23, Francesco Fourneau awards Torino a goal kick.
Free kick for Crotone in the half of Torino.
Crotone are coming forward and Luca Cigarini gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 25, It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Francesco Fourneau signals a Crotone throw-in in Torino's half.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Throw-in for Torino in the half of Crotone.
Throw-in high up the field for Torino in Turin.
In the minute 34, Torino drive upfield and Andrea Belotti gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Crotone defender.
Goal kick for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 37, Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
Play has been interrupted briefly in Turin to check on Ahmad Benali, who is grimacing with pain.
Ahmad Benali returns to the field for Crotone after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 39, Torino to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
Corner awarded to Torino.
Crotone have a goal kick.
In the minute 41, At Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino, Simone Verdi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Torino at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Torino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Torino have a dangerous throw-in.
Torino have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Crotone's Pedro Pereira gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Crotone.
In the minute 45, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Francesco Fourneau blows to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Crotone's Junior Messias misses with an attempt on goal.
Francesco Fourneau awards Torino a goal kick.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Crotone at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
Francesco Fourneau awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 49, Francesco Fourneau signals a Crotone throw-in in Torino's half.
Throw-in Torino.
Torino have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
In the minute 52, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Attention is being given to Torinoâ€™s Andrea Belotti and play has been suspended briefly.
Andrea Belotti has recovered and rejoins the match in Turin.
In the minute 55, Torino have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Pedro Pereira (Crotone) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 55, Torino needs to be cautious. Crotone have an attacking throw-in.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
Sebastiano Luperto (Crotone) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Torino in the half of Crotone.
Francesco Fourneau signals a throw-in for Torino, close to Crotone's area.
Soualiho Meite of Torino is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 58, Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ricardo Rodriguez is booked for the home team.
In the minute 60, Can Crotone capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Torino's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Torino in their own half.
In the minute 63, Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
Throw-in for Torino close to the penalty box.
In the minute 65, Wilfried Stephane Singo is on a sub for Mergim Vojvoda for Torino.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
Marco Giampaolo (Torino) is making a second substitution, with Nicola Murru replacing Ricardo Rodriguez.
In the minute 67, Jacopo Petriccione is replacing Luca Cigarini for the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Crotone in Turin.
Free kick for Torino in their own half.
In the minute 69, Torino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Torino to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
In the minute 71, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Torino's half?
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Torino.
Goal kick for Crotone at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Crotone's Junior Messias is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 75, Can Crotone capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Torino's half?
Crotone attack but Junior Messias's header doesn't find the target.
Francesco Fourneau awards Torino a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Torino in the half of Crotone.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Throw-in Torino.
In the minute 78, Free kick Crotone.
Andrea Belotti (Torino) has received a yellow card from Francesco Fourneau.
Junior Messias for Crotone gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Torino goal kick.
In the minute 80, Francesco Fourneau awards the home team a throw-in.
Torino make their third substitution with Amer Gojak replacing Soualiho Meite.
The home team replace Simone Verdi with Federico Bonazzoli.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Torino close to the penalty box.
Pedro Pereira (Crotone) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 83, Federico Bonazzoli (Torino) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Torino pushes forward through Amer Gojak, whose finish on goal is saved.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Torino.
Crotone have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
In the minute 85, The away team replace Pedro Pereira with Andrea Rispoli.
Luca Siligardi is replacing Milos Vulic for Crotone at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Throw-in for Crotone at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino.
Francesco Fourneau signals a throw-in for Torino, close to Crotone's area.
In the minute 87, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Torino just outside Crotone's area.
Sebastiano Luperto in Crotone has been yellow-carded a second time by Francesco Fourneau and is being sent off.
Sasa Lukic for Torino is whistled offside.
Giuseppe Cuomo is on a sub for Luca Siligardi for Crotone.
In the minute 89, The home team have replaced Karol Linetty with Cristian Ansaldi. This is the fifth substitution made today by Marco Giampaolo.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Turin.
Torino's Federico Bonazzoli breaks free at Stadio Olimpico Grande Torino. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Corner awarded to Torino.
Nicola Murru's header is off-target for Torino.
Ball goes out of play for a Crotone goal kick.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
